name: ORDER_LINKED_FILMS
description: ORDER_LINKED_FILMS stores the films linked to an order (generally, the films created by this order on radiology sites that are not fully live on an electronic PACS system).

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line count for this table as determined by the number of films linked to an order.

columns.name: CHART_ID
columns.description: The films linked to an order (generally, the films created during an order).
